item.title: Tropical Storm ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 4
item.description:
Issued at 0300Z SUN SEP 07 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
TROPICAL STORM ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   4
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
0300Z SUN SEP 07 2003
 
TROPICAL STORM CENTER LOCATED NEAR 13.4N  36.1W AT 07/0300Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 270 DEGREES AT   9 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  997 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  50 KT WITH GUSTS TO  60 KT.
50 KT....... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
34 KT....... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
12 FT SEAS.. 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 13.4N  36.1W AT 07/0300Z
AT 07/0000Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 13.4N  35.6W
 
FORECAST VALID 07/1200Z 13.4N  37.4W
MAX WIND  60 KT...GUSTS  75 KT.
50 KT... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/0000Z 13.8N  39.4W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
64 KT... 20NE  20SE  20SW  20NW.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/1200Z 14.7N  41.8W
MAX WIND  70 KT...GUSTS  85 KT.
64 KT... 20NE  20SE  20SW  20NW.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 09/0000Z 15.6N  44.4W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS  90 KT.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/0000Z 17.0N  49.4W
MAX WIND  80 KT...GUSTS 100 KT.
50 KT... 35NE  35SE  35SW  35NW.
34 KT... 90NE  90SE  90SW  90NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 11/0000Z 18.0N  54.5W
MAX WIND  80 KT...GUSTS 100 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 12/0000Z 18.5N  59.0W
MAX WIND  80 KT...GUSTS 100 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 13.4N  36.1W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 07/0900Z
 
FORECASTER BEVEN
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
